软件包 com.teleca.jamendo.util.download

接口摘要
DownloadDatabase This database is stored on an external sd-card, more specifically, each sd-card that has been used for downloading has it under /jamendroid/downloads.db

Database consists of one table LIBRARY, which basically contains all data about the track plus info whether it has already been downloaded or not

STATUS represents download progress of a track, track records are kept in the LIBRARY table
DownloadJobListener  
DownloadManager Interface to all download related actions.
DownloadObserver Download observer.
DownloadProvider Download jobs provider.
 

类摘要
DownloadDatabaseImpl Database implementation Version 1: Added album_track_num column to database describing track number.
DownloadHelper Various helper functions
DownloadJob Single remote file download task
DownloadJobBuilder Download job builder
DownloadManagerImpl DownloadManager implementation.
DownloadProviderDbImpl DownloadProvider implementations.
DownloadTask File download thread
MediaScannerNotifier Forces mp3 file scan on a downloaded file and adds it to the Android MusicPlayer's library
